text:
Click to email a link to a friend (Opens in new window)

Click to share on Twitter (Opens in new window)

Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window)

Prince Jackson was rushed to the hospital on Thursday after crashing his motorcycle.

“Prince Jackson was involved in a motorcycle accident on his way to college this morning, November 2nd, in Los Angeles,” his rep confirmed to E! News. “He suffered some injuries but is doing OK. Thank you all so much for your support and prayers and we will update you on his progress shortly.”

The 20-year-old son of Michael Jackson posted an Instagram photo of himself with his legs strapped down in an ambulance, captioning it, “Well s–t…”

According to TMZ, Jackson was driving in light rain when he lost control of his bike, but he left the hospital with no broken bones.

The gossip site added that Jackson, who’s a student at Loyola Marymount University, made it to class on time.

A rep did not respond to our request for comment.
title: Prince Jackson injured in motorcycle accident
